name: .GWSAVE File Extension
summary: Learn about .GWSAVE files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a GWSAVE file and edit the saved game data it contains with Microsoft Visual Studio Code, Microsoft Notepad, Apple TextEdit, or any other text editor. Alternatively, you can use the online Inscryption Save Editor to edit the data your GWSAVE file contains.
To use a GWSAVE file with Inscryption, place it one of the following locations (and delete your existing GWSAVE file):
To place a GWSAVE file in Inscryption.app, right-click the file and select Show Package Contents. Then, move your GWSAVE file into the Contents directory that appears.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
